captain_action: Announce engine start sequence. Normal starting sequence is 2, 1.
Call 'STARTING ENGINE No. ___.' Position ENGINE START switch to GRD.

first_officer_action: Verify increase in oil pressure by idle; call 'OIL PRESSURE RISING'.

captain_action: Position engine start lever to IDLE detent when N1 rotation is observed and N2 reaches 25% or max motoring (≥20% N2).
Verify fuel flow and EGT indication.
At 56% N2: ensure START switch moves to OFF (no auto ignition) or AUTO (auto ignition).

first_officer_action: Verify START VALVE OPEN extinguishes and report 'STARTER CUTOUT.'

captain_action: Monitor N1, N2, EGT, fuel flow, oil pressure until engine stabilizes at idle.
[Without automatic ignition]At 56% N2 RPM check ENGINESTART switch moves to OFF; if not,position start switch to OFF.

first_officer_action: [Without automatic ignition]At 56% N2 RPM check ENGINESTART switch moves to OFF; if not,position start switch to OFF.

captain_action: [Automatic ignition]At 56% N2 RPM check ENGINESTART switch moves to AUTO; if not,position start switch to AUTO.

first_officer_action: [Automatic ignition]Verify START VALVE OPEN alertextinguishes as the ENGINE STARTswitch moves to AUTO and report“STARTER CUTOUT.”
